# Zhijiang Culture Center station

| operator           = Hangzhou Metro Corporation
| lines              =
| platforms          =

| opened             = 29 April 2021
| former             = Zhijiang Ocean Park station (project name), Zhipu Road (until 1 February 2024)
| services           =
| route_map          =
}}
Zhijiang Culture Center station () is a metro station on Line 6 of the Hangzhou Metro in China. Opened on 29 April 2021, it is located in the Xihu District of Hangzhou.
The station's name was initially Zhipu Road () until a change of name was announced on 1 February 2024.
